views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11.
NOT TESTED ON iPHONE X

Builded with new iOS 11 SDK (But should still work on iOS 10)

This tweak blocks the power down menu, nothing much else. This tweak is mostly created for if you left your phone out somewhere locked, where somebody could go and power it off (like a friend who for some reason wanted you to lose your jailbreak).

Configure options from Settings.

No Screenshots for this item.

Built with the iOS 9.2 SDK (Toolchain too old for 11)

Added the icon for the preference bundle. That's it.
